Actions.Name: Execute a device command
Actions.Description: Execute a command on a device.

Actions.Description: Get details about an existing device by device ID.

Actions.Description: Get all cloud property values of a device by device ID.

Actions.Description: Get the last telemetry value from a device.

Actions.Description: Delete an existing device by device ID.

Actions.Description: Create a new device or update an existing one by device ID.

Actions.Description: Update all cloud property values of a device by device ID.

Actions.Description: Create an action which triggers when a rule is fired in IoT Central.
